ComicInfo.Summary:
Still Born: B.P.R.D. agents try to deal with a monster fetus.
Downtime: Spoof story about Hellboy having "gremlin trouble" with B.P.R.D. office equipment.
Family Story: Hellboy visits a dysfunctional "haunted" family.
Doc Hollow's Grand Vibro-Destructo Machine Episode 3:: Lobster Johnson finds his assistant corseted and in bondage at the villain's secret hideout.
ComicInfo.Teams: Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense,Gremlins
